options.name: roles
options.description: Ping a role when the status page is updated

options.name: add
options.description: Add an additional role to ping

options.name: channel
options.description: Which status page subscription should ping the provided role. Defaults to current channel

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a role currently being pinged

options.name: channel
options.description: Which status page subscription should the role pings be removed from. Defaults to current channel

options.name: get
options.description: Show which roles will be pinged

options.name: channel
options.description: Show only one channel. Shows all channels if omitted

options.name: mode
options.description: Should incident updates edit the original message or send a new message

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit the original message instead of posting a new message with each incident update.

options.name: post
options.description: Post a new message with each incident update
